events.eventName: Island Innovation Sprint: ICP Ideathon Phuket, Thailand
events.marketingText:
üöÄ Attention Innovators in Phuket! üåê Join the ICP Ideathon and Shape the Future of Decentralized Innovation
Ready to dive into a world where your ideas could redefine the technological landscape? Come, collaborate, and connect with fellow visionaries!
üìÖ Mark your calendar: November 30th, 6:00 PM - A transformative experience awaits!
Indulge in complimentary refreshments üçπ while you brainstorm and build ‚Äì your comfort fuels creativity!
Got a game-changing idea? Pitch it and stand a chance to win:
ü•á 1st place: $200
ü•à 2nd place: $150
ü•â 3rd place: $50
We're on the hunt for revolutionary ideas across various domains:
- Bridging gaps between Web2 and Web3
- Fostering mass adoption of Crypto & NFTs
- Integrating the Real World with Web3
- Innovating in Gaming & Entertainment
- Driving Social Impact & Sustainability
- Advancing Technology & Software Development
- Pioneering in Open Innovations
- Enhancing Security & Cloud Solutions
- Promoting Health & Wellness
- Revolutionizing FinTech & E-commerce
Don't miss this chance to ignite change and win rewards! Register now for an evening of ideation, innovation, and inspiration - all at no cost!

events.marketingText:
Este Hackathon es organizado por ICP Hub Latam y Zona Tres.¬†Internet Computer es un ecosistema Blockchain que se destaca por¬†el desarrollo de Canisters en JavaScript, Python, Motoko y Rust, almacenamiento de informaci√≥n on-chain.
Si ya tienes experiencia desarrollando en alguno de estos lenguajes, esta oportunidad es para ti!!
Algunos de los premios:
üèÜ Premios:
- Primer premio de 1500 USD
- Segundo premio de 1000 USD
- Tercer premio de 500 USD
- Premios bono a mejores integraciones, incluyendo premios a los mejores proyectos que integren ckBTC y el ckETH.
Haz click aqu√≠ para inscribirte:¬†<https://lu.ma/Astro>

üí•¬†Let's finish the year with a **bang & j**oin us for our **Online-Hackathon**¬†in December 2023, where**¬†[AI meets Web3](https://lu.ma/a8q8pj9r?utm_source=f-groups)[.](https://lu.ma/a8q8pj9r)**


üî•¬†This time, [DeArk](https://www.deark.io/)¬†(ICP.Hub Germany) will join forces with [Internet Computer](https://internetcomputer.org/)¬†& [Dacade.](https://dacade.org/)¬†

Topics:

üîπ¬†Build awesome blockchain-powered AI solutions on the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) and explore new Horizons.

üîπ¬†This hackathon will reward the best projects and incubate them within Internet Computers ecosystems.

ü§©¬†[Register now](https://lu.ma/a8q8pj9r?utm_source=f-groups)[¬†](https://lu.ma/a8q8pj9r)and hack away!

¬†¬†¬†Kicking-Off-Event: 8.12.2023

Moritz, Emil, Victor & Fabian

events.marketingText:
‚ÄãDuring the Fireside Chat, esteemed speakers from ICP.HUB HK will share their expertise and insights on the practical applications of Web3 technologies in Hong Kong. They will discuss the transformative power of decentralized blockchain systems and other cutting-edge applications at how they are reshaping industries.¬†

Moderator:
Kate Wong @STFIL
‚ÄãPanel Speakers:
Ryan He @ICP.HUB HK
Monin @MUNG
Miffy Chan @Ozaru
Chris Fung @Yuliverse
‚ÄãDon't miss out on this unique opportunity to learn from industry experts, celebrate the spirit of innovation, and connect with fellow enthusiasts.

About¬†[Dynasty. ICP.HUB HK‚Äã](https://twitter.com/dynasty_icp)
Dynasty is ICP's official Hong Kong hub, created to incubate and accelerate the next wave of locally grown web3 protocols.

About¬†[852Web3](https://twitter.com/852web3)
852Web3 is taking the first step in leading the cultural and community development in Hong Kong, and also a leading Web3 marketing agency in Asia.

‚ÄãAbout¬†[Ooosh Tech Lab‚Äã‚Äã](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ooosh-tech-lab/?originalSubdomain=hk)
Ooosh Tech Lab is an Integrated Venture Capital firm investing into the future of web and work. They build ecosystems with Co-working Space and Incubator for early-stage startups.

events.marketingText: Africa Tech Summit Nairobi connects tech leaders from the African ecosystem and international players under one roof. Network with key stakeholders including tech corporates, mobile operators, fintechs, DeFi & crypto ventures, investors, leading start-ups, regulators and industry stakeholders driving business and investment forward. Following two sold out years, the sixth edition will convene in Nairobi, Kenya 2024.

events.marketingText: University of Colorado will be hosting the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) community meetup, with the help from ICP Hub USA, ¬†ICP Hub LATAM and ICP North America. We will be hosting some of the leaders from the ICP ecosystem who will share with us what is being developed with their blockchain technology and adoption all over the globe.
